summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5572 for the improvement of West 75th Street (South Side), from 28th Avenue Northwest to 31st Avenue Northwest; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 72810 as amended by Ordinance No. 73786 and by Ordinance No. 74170, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
